We only use approved Ctrl V cleaning agents on the headset to minimize the chance of damage to the hardware. During your next visit, if you have any specific concerns about the cleanliness of the headset, please do not hesitate to approach a staff for assistance. We hope to see you again soon!

He was across the room engrossed in watching other people play. He made not even a cursory check to see how I was doing, so was probably quite unaware that I was paying good money to watch a large blue clock count down.  One of the most frustrating experiences of my entire life.  Eventually I had to take off the equipment and physically go find this attendant to complain.  Your software needs an easily accessed online virtual user manual for first time users.  As I said to him "if Pac Man had been this hard to use, it would never have caught on".
Responce: Hi Ian, thank you for taking the time to send us this feedback.  We really aim to make the experience as easy for beginners as possible, so on behalf of our team, I apologize for anything that happened to the contrary.' 'We\'ve reviewed the security footage from your session the other night, and we did notice that your group might have missed the explainer video which we play on our projector prior to every session. This explainer video is our version of a "virtual user manual" for our first-time users, as it provides a detailed demonstration of how to move in and out of content, and how to manage the pause menu.  If you have any suggestions as to how we could make this particular function more obvious in the video, we\'d really appreciate the input.' "We have also reviewed our employee's actions during the start of your session.  It appears he visited your particular station five times in the first 10 minutes of your session to assist you.  He then came back an additional three times in the following 10 minutes.  We understand though, that when you are in VR, the sense of time is distorted, so it may have seemed like much longer between his visits." "If it's any consolation, the first VR experience for our customers always has the steepest learning curve.  We're confident that the issues you experienced won't be a problem during your next visit." 'Thank you again for the valuable feedback - we look forward to hearing from you again soon! :)

Review: Fun place, but no help for games. Waister prob 30 mins between games trying to figure out how they work. Also did not have sound for a good 10 mins. Will get better as you go there more often.
Responce: Hi Cedric, thank you for the review and feedback. We're very sorry that you had difficulties playing some of the games. As with any new experience, there will be a steep learning curve as you figure out how things work! The staff are always available to help with any questions you might have, but we don't know if you need help unless you ask for it :). Sound is an imperative part of having a fully immersive experience, but unfortunately sometimes technology fails us. Next time your sound stops working just let one of the staff know and we will fix it for you immediately! We hope to have you in again soon so you can have a more positive experience with us.
